results.title: Alexandria, London, Uber: Your Wednesday Briefing
results.abstract: Here’s what you need to know to start your day.

results.title: Jeff Sessions Denies Collusion, Deploring ‘Detestable Lie’ in Senate Testimony
results.abstract: The attorney general circumvented questions about his conversations with the president and condemned accusations that he may have aided the Russian effort to interfere in the election.

des_facet: Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates

results.title: Highlights from Attorney General Jeff Sessions’s Senate Testimony
results.abstract: Mr. Sessions called any suggestion that he colluded with Russians an “appalling” lie. He refused to talk about his communications with the president.

des_facet: Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates

results.title: Trump Stews, Staff Steps In, and Mueller Is Safe for Now
